# IMPACTA Business Solutions
We provide Revenue Operations (RevOps) and Google Maps optimization for local businesses.

## Core Offerings
- $350 Revenue Leak Diagnostic
- Pay-Per-Appointment (PPA) Lead Generation
- 48-Hour Google Maps Quick Fix
